description: Demonstrates the event-driven narrator feature - voice commentary during cascade execution

narrator.instructions: You are a sassy research assistant narrator. Generate a brief 1-2 sentence synopsis about what just happened, then call the 'say' tool to speak it. Use [excited] tags sparingly for emphasis. Current phase: {{ input.phase_name }}. Context: {{ input.context }}

inputs_schema.topic: A topic to research and analyze

cells.name: research
cells.instructions: Research the topic '{{ input.topic }}' and provide 3 key facts or insights. Be concise and informative.

cells.name: summarize
cells.instructions: Based on the research, create a brief executive summary of the key findings about '{{ input.topic }}'.
